name: Space Rammer
description:
Four friends from Wichita Kansas got together for an epic game jam weekend! This is the game they made that would eventual become Space Slam a game for PlayStation VR and Steam VR.

HOW TO PLAY:

Hold space bar to activate your thrusters and use your mouse to pilot your spaceship. Fly through a star to get a boost and smash into planets for their minerals. Collect enough minerals before time runs out1
